name: news_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bb_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etcâ€¦ to create a financial site/application such as bloomberg.com
API description: Fetches a list of news articles based on the specified category.

is_id.description: The category of news to fetch, allowable values include markets, technology, view, pursuits, politics, green, citylab, businessweek, fixed-income, hyperdrive, cryptocurrencies, wealth, latest, personalFinance, quickTake, world, industries, stocks, currencies, brexit.
